channel.title: 生成器 on wxx's blog

item.title: 生成器和迭代器
item.description: To understand what yield does, you must understand what generators are. And before you can understand generators, you must understand iterables. Iterables When you create a list, you can read its items one by one. Reading its items one by one is called iteration: 1 2 3 4 5 6 >>> mylist = [1, 2, 3] >>> for i in mylist: ... print(i) 1 2 3 mylist is an iterable.
